alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 12:29PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, southeastern Pasco, northwestern Manatee, southeastern Pinellas, Hillsborough and northwestern Polk Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1229 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Groveland to near Macdill Air Force Base to 48 miles southwest of Anna Maria. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, Sarasota, Bradenton, Plant City, Winter Haven, Temple Terrace, Haines City, Bartow, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Palmetto, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fort Desoto Park, Fish Hawk, Saint Petersburg, Brandon, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach and Anna Maria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter
